title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 79.7 - Letter of credit-disqualified bank
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 79.7 - Letter of credit-disqualified bank

State Regulations

Letters of credit or confirmations issued on or after the effective date of this Part [December 30, 1987] which meet all of the conditions set forth in this Part on the date of issuance but where the issuing or confirming bank no longer meets the standards for a qualified bank after the issuance of the letters of credit or confirmations will continue to be acceptable to this department until the occurrence of the earlier of their stated expiration date, next extension or renewal date, modification or amendment. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
79.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
